replies.bodyText:
This is the fix on non-required constant. This enum got only one value. But since it is non-required, user could still choose between null and Action.ALLOW.
If it is treated as constant, the Allow will be directly inserted, and no user input needed, hence the class was not needed before.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: this raises a little concern, curious why order of params changed
timeline.author: yungezz

replies.bodyText: change in modelerfour. currently there is no strict order on parameters, only non-required parameter after required parameter.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: Also since apiVersion and subscriptionId is filled internally, the method signature remain unchanged as the public client method. (method is service is not public hence user cannot use them)
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft
